boons.name: Brutal Strength
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boons.
boons.flavour: Bloodshed is one avenue to victory.
stats: Gain +5 attack.
Gain +10 attack
Gain +15 attack

boons.name: Exposed
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boons.
boons.flavour: The best defence is a good offense.
stats: Convert 50% of your defence into attack.
Convert 75% of your defence into attack.
Convert 100% of your defence into attack.

boons.name: Killing Blow
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boons.
boons.flavour: As the end nears, you go for the kill.
stats: Enemies left below 5% hp after an attack are automatically executed.
Enemies left below 7% hp after an attack are automatically executed.
Enemies left below 9% hp after an attack are automatically executed.

boons.name: Hunter's Eye
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boons.
boons.flavour: You understand what to look for when searching for prey.
stats: Gain +5 attack priority on all weapons. If your weapon is a bow, gain +5 damage on your normal and special attacks.
Gain +6 attack priority on all weapons. If your weapon is a bow, gain +8 damage on your normal and special attacks.
Gain +7 attack priority on all weapons. If your weapon is a bow, gain +11 damage on your normal and special attacks.

boons.name: Precision Strike
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boons.
boons.flavour: When the vitals are exposed, you take your best shot.
stats: Gain a 10% chance to deal double damage on your normal attacks.
Gain a 15% chance to deal double damage on your normal attacks.
Gain a 20% chance to deal double damage on your normal attacks.

boons.name: First Strike
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boons.
boons.flavour: You take every advantage you can get.
stats: If you strike an enemy first, your attack will deal double damage.

boons.name: Reciprocation
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room.
boons.flavour: You're not the only one feeling this love.
stats: When attacked, there is a 10% chance to redirect 50% of damage taken to the attacker.
When attacked, there is a 20% chance to redirect 50% of damage taken to the attacker.
When attacked, there is a 30% chance to redirect 50% of damage taken to the attacker.

boons.name: Charm
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room.
boons.flavour: Your displays of talent knocks the enemies off their feet.
stats: After using your special attack, there is a 20% chance to stun the target for one turn.
After using your special attack, there is a 30% chance to stun the target for one turn.
After using your special attack, there is a 40% chance to stun the target for one turn.

boons.name: Go Easy on Me
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room.
boons.flavour: It doesn't take much convincing for an uneven fight.
stats: Enemies deal 10% less damage to you.
Enemies deal 14% less damage to you.
Enemies deal 18% less damage to you.

boons.name: Smite
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room.
boons.flavour: You're not going down without a fight.
stats: If you were to take lethal damage, execute the enemy who delivered the attack. If the enemy is a boss or miniboss, it deals 10% max hp damage instead.

boons.name: Thundering Fury
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room.
boons.flavour: You're gonna make them remember your name.
stats: Once you lose attack priority, remove 40% defence of the target you just attacked.
Once you lose attack priority, remove 50% defence of the target you just attacked.
Once you lose attack priority, remove 60% defence of the target you just attacked.

boons.name: Stormbreaker
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room.
boons.flavour: One attack will not cut it.
stats: Your attacks bounce to one other target, dealing 60% of the initial attack's damage.
Your attacks bounce to one other target, dealing 75% of the initial attack's damage.
Your attacks bounce to one other target, dealing 90% of the initial attack's damage.

boons.name: Sucky Wucky
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boons.
boons.flavour: The taking of life is such a waste.
stats: 4% of all damage dealt is restored as health.
5% of all damage dealt is restored as health.
6% of all damage dealt is restored as health.

boons.name: Vitality
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boons.
boons.flavour: You feel a little bit better after that fight.
stats: Restore +20hp now. After clearing a room, restore +5 hp. If your hp is maxed out, gain +2 max hp instead.

boons.name: High Tide
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boons.
boons.flavour: Last place you'd expect a second chance is hell, huh?

boons.name: Fortify
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue.
boons.flavour: Your resolve is strengthened greatly.
boons.stat: Gain +20 defence. If your weapon is a shield, this effect is doubled.

boons.name: Divine Protection
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue.
boons.flavour: You feel empowered by an unknown feeling.
boons.stat: Gain a 4% chance to completely block the next instance of damage.

boons.name: Stand Your Ground
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue.
boons.flavour: Pain is an afterthought.
boons.stat: Damage that would otherwise be lethal reduces your hp to 1.

boons.name: Berserker
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: It's time to test your skills...
boons.stat: Reduce your max hp to 10, but you gain a 500% damage bonus.

boons.name: Call to Arms
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: How about another go?

boons.name: Sheath
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: The word 'consequence' just became a lot clearer.
boons.stat: You gain +25 attack priority but deal 75% reduced damage.

boons.name: Playing with Fire
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: You feel the risk... but also the reward.
boons.stat: Switches your special attack to a bomb that deals 25% of an enemy's max hp. If you don't use the bomb within 4 rooms, well... you don't want to find out.

boons.name: Satanic Ritual
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: It's hard to resist such a tempting offer.
boons.stat: Once per room, using your special attack begins a ritual. Immediately after casting, you lose attack priority for the next 4 turns. Once the ritual is complete, damage an enemy for 99% of their current hp.

boons.name: Thou Knoweth Not Weakness
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: To gain strength, one must first know weakness.
boons.stat: For the next 3 rooms, lose -50% of your attack. Afterwards, gain an additional +25% of your original attack.
